TopicTitle: Can't get MechJeb to work, please help :)

Articles.Content:
First post and already a problem

Also, sorry for my bad english, not my native tongue.

Ok, I downloaded the very latest MechJeb from here:

http://jenkins.mumech.com/job/MechJeb2/84/

Extracted the files to my GameData folder so the Directory Structure in GameData looks like this:

/Squad

/MechJeb2

Changed the part.cfg to this:

TechRequired = start

entryCost = 0

(I also tried it with TechRequired = basicRocketry, but same effect ->)

Now when I start KSP, goto RND, I can then research the MechJeb AR202 in the start node.

If I go and build a rocket then it tells me below the AR202: "part model requires an entry purchase". I can't click / place the damn thing . I don't get it.

When I go back to RND then (after I was in the rocket building screen) I can research the AR202 again, but nothing ever changes.

I don't know why. I re-did the process about 5 times before but now it just works?!

Jeez
